title: Newly renovated split level 2BR 1 bath apt New Appliances deck/yard
description: Our long term tenant just purchased her own home and moved out. We are so happy for her! We renovated the kitchen and bathroom. Brand new flooring, new lower kitchen cabinets and quartz countertops! All appliances are brand new whirlpool including stove, fridge, microwave and yes DISHWASHER! See pictures ( one of pics is of backsplash. Our prior tenant was nice enough to leave her washer and dryer behind so there is a working washer and dryer in the basement. This is a split level duplex. It has a beautiful eat in kitchen, living room two bedrooms full bath and a large unfinished basement . There is a driveway on each side of the duplex. This duplex has a large shared deck and a large double lot yard also shared (each side has their own driveway). Snow removal is tenants responsibility.
This duplex is located in a beautiful quiet family friendly neighborhood.
Tenant is responsible for pmt of utilities but landlord is responsible for water bill.
No pets and no smoking please.

title: Small Ranch in Westerly
description: Two bedroom one bath ranch with large yard and large rear deck. 1100 SF with full basement.  No pets, owner checks credit and background.  One year term only.  Tenant responsible for all utilities, lawn/snow negotiable.  Older interior but very well maintained.  Oil heat/newer boiler with central air.
Available for one year only - 2 bedrooms plus a small office.

title: dorable 2 bedroom 1 bath single family house 4 rent and ready to move
description: Adorable 2 bedroom house with updated kitchen, new refrigerator and stove, new boiler, new washer dryer that is included, new deck, new floors and a huge back yard! 2 bed, 1 bath home is perfect for a family. The air-conditioned home has all new carpeting, fresh paint, and a renovated screened-in porch. There is a new refrigerator and microwave in the main kitchen. The finished basement also has a small kitchen, including another fridge and stove, a washer and dryer and large bonus room. The property also features a 1-car garage and a storage shed. This all brick home is on a quiet street conveniently located just seconds from Brodhead Rd and Interstate 376. It's within the stellar Central Valley School District. Pets and smoking are not permitted. Tenant pays utilities. Beautiful 2 bedroom/1 bath - Living room windows offer great view of Main Street. Kitchen/Dining area. Dishwasher, pantry space, ceiling fans both bedrooms, recessed lighting. Workout Facility, Clubhouse, Laundry facilities & much more! Includes water and trash removal. No pets or caged animals. Single family home located in the heart of downtown Mastic. Walking distance to Main Street, train station, and the fairgrounds. A huge backyard and an attached single car garage as well, 2000 Washer/Dryer hook ups huge Yard, fenced Deck in back with ramp One Story home. Washer and dryer hook up in garage. Near Bart Month to Month, This cozy 2 bedroom one bath home has a one car garage, Stove, Microwave and Washer/Dryer included. Gardener Paid Newly remodeled with tile in the kitchen and bath and new carpets in the bedroom. New paint. Small private yard. This home is located in the city of Westerly near shopping centers,schools and parks. . Asking $900.00 per mo, Refundable deposit is also $900, Great home. Newly remodeled. new flooring, new appliances, new carpet, upgraded bathrooms, 2 car garage, covered patio, yard backyard tenant pays electricty and water Extremely clean, ready to move in right away. Address is 6 Boxwood Ave, Westerly, RI 02891.

title: 2 Bedroom, Nice neighborhood
description: This apartment is between beach and park, 10 minute walk to Westerly downtown and park,
Close to major highways, 19 minutes to Foxwoods.
Close to everything; grocery store, gas station, Lux gym, beauty salon, bowling, coffee shops, restaurants: Ella's, Providence Pizza, pick pocket , Domino Pizza, McDonald...
2 Bedrooms, second floor; in a 2 store building.
A lot of windows and light.
Open kitchen with good size fridge, stove, cabinets,
All utilities are separate from the first floor.
Includes yard maintenance and garbage removal.
Dogs are acceptable, with extra $100 monthly fee and $500 deposit, some breeds are restricted.
First and deposit prior to move in.

title: 35 Langworthy Rd, Westerly, RI 02891
description: Great location close and convenient to all the amenities. The beautiful beaches of Misquamicut/ Watch Hill are only 1.5 miles away. Beach pass is provided.
You can enjoy live music and drive-in movies most evenings on the beach. For the children there is an arcade, minature golf, batting cages, go carts, waterslides.

Downtown Westerly is only 4.5 miles away. Wilcox Park, The Granite Theatre as well as a wide variety of cuisune choices for dinner. Everything from sushi to pizza. There are a lot of very good restaurants in Downtown westerly. Stonington Borough, Mystic Ct., Matunuck Oyster Bar, Coast Guard House in Narragansett are only short rides away.
Close to the house there is a Walmart less than half a mile away as well as Dunn's Corners Market. Everything you would need in less than 5 miles.
Appliances: Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer, Range/Oven, Refrigerator, Microwave

title: Townhouse Style 2bd/1.5ba Close to Misquamicut
description: Beautiful, sunny and newly renovated 2 bedroom/1.5 bathroom duplex townhouse unit in Dunn's Corner available for rent immediately!  This unit features a large living area, separate eat in kitchen with brand new stainless steel appliances including microwave and dishwasher, brand new floors, freshly painted rooms, washer/dryer in unit, back deck, basement with bulkhead access to the back yard, two spacious bedrooms on the second floor and all new bathrooms.  Tenant is responsible for water, electricity, snow removal.  Landlord will pay for sewer and landscaping.  Large driveway in front of the house with room for two cars.

First month and security required at lease signing.  We are looking for a yearly lease but will consider a seasonal lease also. No pets and no smoking.  Must have excellent credit over 650 and make gross income of over $55K.
